text: Novoalexandrovka () is a rural locality (a selo) in Berdyashsky Selsoviet, Zilairsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 119 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 28 km from Zilair, 12 km from Berdyash. == References == Category:Rural localities in Zilairsky District
title: Novoalexandrovka, Zilairsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
